name: fleet-go-on
description: Aggregator app for quick commerce and food delivery services

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run customer:dev" "npm run partner:dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../customer-app && npm install && cd ../delivery-partner-app && npm install
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run customer:build && npm run partner:build
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run customer:test && npm run partner:test

author: Fleet-Go-on Team
